title: Value Block (V1)
description: Block containing a single value measurement.

type.title: Block Type
type.description: The type of the block. Must be 'SimpleBenchValueBlock::V1' for Value Block version 1.

semantic_type.title: Measurement Type
semantic_type.description: The semantic type of the measurements, formatted as 'namespace::type_name'. This dictates how the data should be interpreted. Standard types use the 'simplebench_std' namespace. Users can define custom types using their own namespace.

timer.title: Timer
timer.description: The timing function used for this measurement (e.g., 'perf_counter'). Should be included for any timing-related metrics.
